trends: There have been no other sightings in Cottage Grove
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Plane or Helicopter chasing after 2 blue balls of light that merged into one ball of light
divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving and dark so couldn't make out if it was a plane or helicopter which was chasing 2 balls of blueish light not blinking which was strange enough that I actually stopped in the middle of the road to watch. The two balls of light became one ball and made a maneuver over highway 94 with plane still chasing. Seen from Cottage Grove.
